## R Markdown

This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see <http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com>.

When you click the **Knit** button a document will be generated that includes both content as well as the output of any embedded R code chunks within the document. You can embed an R code chunk like this:
```{r}
full_corpus_forms <- read.delim("/data/tragopan/palma/gocode/src/seed-semantic-change/src/dynamic-senses/GTeval/full_corpus_forms.txt", header=FALSE)
View(full_corpus_forms)
dates_full_forms <- full_corpus_forms[,1]
hist(dates_full_forms)
summary(dates_full_forms)
```

### Full_corpus_ids

full_corpus_ids <- read.delim("/data/tragopan/palma/gocode/src/seed-semantic-change/src/dynamic-senses/greek_input/full_corpus_ids.txt", header=FALSE)
